TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UICollectionViewDropDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool CanHandleDropSession (this MonoTouch.UIKit.IUICollectionViewDropDelegate This, MonoTouch.UIKit.UICollectionView collectionView, MonoTouch.UIKit.IUIDropSession session);

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates on.
Docs.summary: Returns a Boolean value that tells whether the collection view can handle drops from the data in the session.
